overview: Upscale male escort Malcolm Tremell (Darius McCrary) wants a change in this drama based on Michael Baisden's best-selling novel. After years of living a fantasy life with expensive cars, hot women paying him for sex and enough money to buy whatever he wants, Malcolm begins to long for a more fulfilling existence. When he meets a beautiful dancer, he may have found what he needs -- if he's willing to change. Billy Dee Williams co-stars.
title: The Maintenance Man
